name: Stefan (@kranzkrone@quasselkopf.de)
summary:
So fittingly described by @aral@mastodon.ar.al what's wrong with the Term of User:

The Big Web has “users” – a term Silicon Valley has borrowed from drug dealers to describe the people they addict to their services and exploit.

Source: https://ar.al/2020/08/07/what-is-the-small-web/

#SmallWeb #Users #WrongTerm
